titles.default: The Case of the Missing Page

descriptions.400: Bad request?! You big DUMMY! You gotta coordinate your typing! In the war, we had to coordinate our attacks or we'd all be dead!
descriptions.401: Unauthorized?! Let me tell you something - back in the war, you show up without authorization, they put you in the brig! You understand me, dummy?!
descriptions.402: They want PAYMENT?! Elizabeth, I'm coming! My chest! In all my years running this junkyard, I never heard such a thing!
descriptions.403: FORBIDDEN?! This page is like Aunt Esther's face - off limits and nobody wants to see it anyway! Oh, my heart!
descriptions.404: Not found? You big dummy! This is like when Lamont can't find my good whiskey that I hid in the radiator - you ain't looking hard enough!
descriptions.405: Wrong method?! In the war, we used the RIGHT method or people got hurt! You gotta COORDINATE these things!
descriptions.406: Not acceptable?! Well I got news for you - Aunt Esther ain't acceptable either but she still shows up! Elizabeth, I'm coming!
descriptions.408: Timeout?! I'll give YOU a timeout, you big dummy! My heart can't take all this waiting - this is the BIG ONE!
descriptions.409: Conflict? CONFLICT?! Let me tell you about conflict - in the war, we had REAL conflict! Bombs, bullets, Aunt Esther visiting the base!
descriptions.410: Gone permanently?! Just like my good looks, my hair, and my first truck! Everything good in my life is GONE! I'm coming, Elizabeth!
descriptions.413: Too large?! That's what the doctor said about my heart after Aunt Esther showed up! You gotta coordinate the size, dummy!
descriptions.429: Too many requests?! You're worse than Grady asking to borrow money! STOP ASKING! My ticker can't handle this!
descriptions.500: Internal error?! My INSIDES got an error too - it's called a HEART ATTACK! This is the big one, Elizabeth!
descriptions.502: Bad gateway?! In the war, a bad gateway meant you walked into the WRONG CAMP! Coordinate your routes, you big dummy!
descriptions.503: Service unavailable?! That's like me after Aunt Esther leaves - I need time to RECOVER! My heart, Elizabeth!
descriptions.504: Gateway timeout?! Elizabeth, you hear this?! Even the MACHINES are having heart problems now! I'm coming to join you, honey!
descriptions.default: This is the big one, Elizabeth! I'm coming to join you, honey!
